content.question: Which of the following best explains why many respondents to the poll agreed that the statement “The court system treats everyone fairly” described Nigeria well?

choices.label: The Nigerian government has eliminated the Shariah Courts in the north.
The Nigerian government has arrested and issued lengthy sentences to political protesters.
The president has been significantly increasing the size of the Nigerian court system and has appointed judges who support the same political ideology.
The Nigerian government has made an effort to reduce corruption in the judicial system by protecting the power of judicial review and independence.

content.answer: The Nigerian government has made an effort to reduce corruption in the judicial system by protecting the power of judicial review and independence.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain what the data implies or illustrates about political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
